title: Moist Fruit and Pecan Cake
ingredients: ['320ml vegetable oil', '600g caster sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '260g tinned crushed pineapple with juice', '450g mashed bananas', '115g chopped pecans', '375g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '250g cocktail cherries (optional)']
